flawed_nl_solution:
He has 60-20= <<60-20=40>>40 kilograms of mangoes left after selling them to the market.
Colby sold 1/2 x 40 = <<1/2*40=80/1>>80/1 kilograms of mangoes to the community.
Therefore, Colby still has -40x8= <<-40*8=-320>>-320 pieces of mangoes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 80/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
